Element.title: Ea iriure facilisi theophrastus
Element.Body: Ea iriure facilisi theophrastus qui, illud temporibus eu usu, est cu tantas eirmod iuvaret. Ius nonumes copiosae te. Est ei vivendum deseruisse, vis essent iriure ad, eos evertitur abhorreant delicatissimi ex. Sed cibo habeo mucius ut. Mei te etiam audiam, nec iuvaret intellegat no. Element.title: How to get started with the Stonetown Karate Manual Editor
Element.Body: The Stonetown Karate Manual Editor is a proprietary software created to to for the rapid development and updating of an operations manual for Stonetown Karate Centre Inc.. With use of this software you will be able to create documents with simple paragraphs, list, tables and figures.

Element.title: Getting Started - Paragraph
Element.Body: When opening the program you will be brought to the page shown below. From here you will first need to create one or more elements to be added to your manual. To add a paragraph simply select the paragraph element for the selection on the right panel of the screen. This will open the window seen below. From here you must at a minimum add a title to the paragraph then you can click "Add Element" to save.

Element.title: An example of the paragraph functionality.
Getting Started - List
Element.Body: To use the list element first click the "List" button on the right panel of the screen. Once done you will see a menu like the one shown in the figure below. To add to this list simple type anything in the empty line and a new empty line and a new line will appear. When you are happy with you list click the "Add Element" button to save. An Example of a List can be seen below.

Element.title: An Example of the List element.
Getting Started - Figure
Element.Body: To use the figure element first click the "Figure" button on the right panel of the screen. Once done you will see a menu like the one shown in the figure below. To save a figure first add a title, pick a size with the radio buttons and then upload an image via the "Upload" button. When done click the "Add Element" button.

Element.title: An example of a figure element.
Updating Elements
Element.Body: To update an element select the element you would like to edit from the elements list on the right panel. This will open the element like when they are first added from there you can simply make your edits, To save the updates click the "Update Elements" button.

Element.title: Adult Karate​ Classes
Element.Body: A perfect blend of Karate, Self-defense and fitness that will give you the confidence to protect yourself and loved ones.

Element.title: Junior Karate Classes
Element.Body: Give your child a positive start on life. Children ages 5 & up will benefit from Karate principles and our unique Life Skills program
